answerText: TCA cycle [or Krebs cycle; or Citric Acid cycle][10] In the TCA cycle, fumarase converts fumarate into this molecule.
heading: ACF Regionals |2012 | Maryland A + Chicago B | 8 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: A long standing mystery over how this process works in cyanobacteria was recently solved with the discovery of a novel 2-oxoglutarate decarboxylase. For 10 points each: [10] Name this metabolic cycle fed by pyruvate that begins with a reaction between oxaloacetate and acetyl-CoA.
